item.title: Welcome to the New SSS Blog
item.description: Welcome to the new SSS Blog. Why a new blog, when the existing one works fine? The main reason is that since I feel confident about my coding abilities in several different “traditional” programming languages, I’m now interested in working in more web-centric languages and frameworks. I’ve always put off learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript because they seemed clunky and obtuse. But I’ve realized that whereas ten years ago the desktop was everything, now the web (and mobile apps) are king.
